alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Inland; Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 1:15AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BALDWIN...WESTERN ESCAMBIA AND NORTHWESTERN ESCAMBIA COUNTIES THROUGH 200 AM CST... At 115 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over I65 And AL 225, or 5 miles northwest of Bay Minette, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Atmore, Stockton, McCullough, I65 And AL 225, I65 And CR 1, I65 And AL 21, and Poarch Creek Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for south central Alabama. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 800 AM CST for south central Alabama.
